title: Punjab to set up special fraud detection unit to check GST violations
summary: Punjab is establishing a state-level Special Fraud Detection Unit in Patiala to combat GST violations. This unit will focus on uncovering circular trading, benami transactions, and fake invoicing using advanced technologies like AI and data analytics.
fullContent: Punjab is establishing a state-level Special Fraud Detection Unit in Patiala to combat GST violations. This unit will focus on uncovering circular trading, benami transactions, and fake invoicing using advanced technologies like AI and data analytics. The SFDU will comprise experienced tax officers and IT professionals, empowered to take stringent actions against offenders and safeguard the state's revenue.
